title: Understanding HTML Structure v2
description: Learn about HTML tags and document structure

content.data: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.
HTML forms are used to collect user input. Learn how to create effective and accessible forms.

title: Updated Lesson Title
description: Learn about JavaScript variables and data types

content.data: In JavaScript, variables are containers for storing data values.
